name: Borderlands: The Secret Armory of General Knoxx
name_original: Borderlands: The Secret Armory of General Knoxx
description:
Borderlands: The Secret Armory of General Knoxx is an action-shooter game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 23-02-2010. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands: The Secret Armory of General Knoxx on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
